title: Motion CPR Critical Protection and Repair Treatment Conditioner, 15 Ounce
description: Finally a salon inspired relaxer system that helps your hair shine as fiercely as you do. It offers revolutionary advancement in at home relaxing technology. Contains pre-treatment conditioner. One treatment will stop or slow serious breakage.

title: Fair & White Savon Exclusive Whitenizer 7oz (Exfoliating)
description: Rich In Plant Extracts Gently Rubs Your Skin To Eliminate Impurities And Dead Cells Combines Apricot Kernels, Almond Oil And Pure Shea Butter For A More Radiant Skin Can Be Used In The Morning And/Or Evening On Your Face And Body

title: Betty Dain Stylish Design Mold Resistant Shower Cap, The Hipster Collection, "Tough Love"
description: The Betty Dain Hipster Collection of Stylish Shower Caps shown here in the pattern "Tough Love" offers a waterproof and mold-resistant shower cap that is oversized to fit thick or long hair. The Hipster Collection of Stylish Shower Caps is made from  frosted PEVA and comes with a colorful elastic lace trim. Additional patterns "Hippie Chick" and "Flower Power" available separately.
